title: Design
desc: Usability and design go hand-in-hand, and I do my best to create responsive, accessible and optimised sites whose layouts inspire potential users. I have a huge interest in all things design, too, and will bring my passions for typography, layouts, colours and other design trends into my work.

title: Develop
desc: I love the challenge of learning new ways to problem solve, something that web development as a discipline has at its core. Learning new methods, languages, libraries or frameworks - all with the singular goal of creating the best site possible - is my endgoal.
